search.name: Wolfram Alpha
search.description:
Wolfram|Alpha aims to bring expert-level knowledge and capabilities to the broadest possible range of people. The goal is to accept completely free-form input, and to serve as a knowledge engine that generates powerful results and presents them with maximum clarity.
